items.sentence: Tom laughed before he realized that Mary wasn't joking.

You don't have to go to Australia if you don't want to.
Tom told Mary he hadn't eaten anything since breakfast.
I don't think there's any chance that Tom will do that.
The day is sure to come when your dream will come true.
Tom's mother asked him to wash his hands before eating.
The road in front of my house is open to traffic again.
